description: The problem is about generating all the subsets of a set in MiniZinc. The model uses the binary representation of integers from 0 to 2^n-1 to represent the subsets. For example, the binary representation 0 0 0 represents an empty subset, 0 0 1 represents a subset containing the element 1, 0 1 0 represents a subset containing the element 2, and so on. The goal is to generate all possible subsets of a set with n elements. The subsets are represented as an array of sets, where each set is a subset of the original set. The problem is solved when all subsets are generated.

metadata.name: Generate All Subsets of a Set

unverified_metadata.name: Generate All Subsets of a Set
